alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 3:11AM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of southwest South Dakota and west central South Dakota, including the following counties, in southwest South Dakota, Jackson and Oglala Lakota. In west central South Dakota, Pennington. * WHEN...Until 330 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding along the White River and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 308 AM MDT, Doppler radar and gauge reports indicated heavy rain and ongoing flooding across the warned area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Southern Badlands National Park and northern Pine Ridge Reservation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
